channel.title: Announcements on MinecraftForge Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on MinecraftForge Blog

item.author: curle
item.title: Forge Jam 2022 Results
item.summary: The Forge Modding Jam of 2022 is over, and the results are in!
item.description: The Forge Modding Jam of 2022 is over, and the results are in! We ended judging on the 12th August, and the top 3 winners are Antsportation, SkulkTransporting and Railgun Transport.

item.author: cpw
item.title: ForgeJAM 2022 Submissions
item.summary: Forge JAM 2022 Submissions are now live until the end of July 31st PDT
item.description: Forge JAM 2022 Submissions are now live at https://forms.gle/rorhKygc2jvsKY8w7 until the end of July 31st PDT

item.author: curle
item.title: Forgejam 2022
item.summary: The Forge Jam will run from 1st July to 31st July, with judging on the 1st August. Further details..
item.description: A modding jam hosted by Forge itself! The theme is item transportation via land, sea or air. Submit your mods by the 31st of July to be in to win some cool prizes.

item.author: cpw
item.title: Forge Annual Parlay 2022
item.description: FAP 2022 is going to be on 1st July 2022 at 3pm Eastern US time, ask your questions of the team
